data.rawText:
Neeraj Wadhwaney 
ƒ +91 7805055283 # neerajwadhwaney2003@gmail.com ï linkedin.com / in / neeraj - w 
§ github.com / neeraj2710 
Education 

Lakshmi Narain College of Technology Excellence, Bhopal, MP 2021 – 2025 Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering Current CGPA — 7.40 
St. Xavier's Sr. Sec. Co - Ed School, Bhopal, MP 2020 – 2021 12th — CBSE 81.6% 
St. Xavier's Sr. Sec. Co - Ed School, Bhopal, MP 2018 – 2019 10th — CBSE 83.6% 
Technical Skills 

Languages: Java, SQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript Technologies / Frameworks: Spring Boot, Hibernate, JDBC, Collections, Servlet, JSP, JUnit 
Developer Tools: IntelliJ Idea, VS Code, NetBeans 8.2, CodeBlocks, SQL Developer 
Professional Experience 
Z IT Solutions June 2024 – July 2024 Java Development Intern 
• Gained hands - on experience in implementing CRUD operations using Java to efficiently manage and interact with databases. 
• Developed dynamic desktop applications using JavaFX with responsive UI components. 
• Acquired foundational knowledge of multithreading and serialization / deserialization, ensuring efficient application performance and data handling. A2infotech Feb 2023 – Mar 2023 Java SE Intern 
• Gained experience with Java Swing and AWT, designed and implemented graphical user interfaces for desktop applications. 
• Worked with JDBC to connect and interact with an Oracle database, enhancing my skills in database management and SQL queries. 
• Developed a standalone Java desktop application, integrating GUI components and database connectivity to create a fully functional software solution. 
Projects 
Elevare 
§ Present 
• Developed a full - stack job portal "Hiresense" using Jakarta EE (Servlets, JSP) and Hibernate with MySQL as the backend database, and HTML, CSS, JavaScript for the frontend. 
• Integrated Affinda AI API to automatically parse and analyze candidate resumes and calculate percentage match with job descriptions based on skills, experience, and qualifications. 
• Implemented features like user registration / login, job posting, resume upload, and real - time AI - based profile - to - job matching, enhancing recruitment efficiency. Air Quality Monitoring System 
§ November 2024 
• Worked on an IoT - based Air Quality Monitoring System using ESP32, integrating sensors for AQI, temperature, humidity, and pressure. 
• Developed firmware in C++ and contributed to data transmission for real - time monitoring via a React frontend and Node.js backend. 
• System supports 30 - day historical data logging and is patent - published (Application No. 
202521019321). Happy Tummy 
§ January 2024 
• Developed HappyTummy, a user - friendly Web / Desktop application, to optimize the online food delivery process for customers and restaurants. 
• Utilized Java SE, Java Swing, Jakarta EE, HTML, CSS, Servlet, JSP and JDBC for efficient development and enhanced user experience. Integrated Oracle 11g as database. 
• Implemented key features including mail confirmation, Spoonacular API integration for menu information, seamless food ordering, add - to - cart functionality, and customer review options. 
Activities & Honors 

• Completed a 12 - week course on Programming in Java, from the National Programme on Technology Enhanced Learning platform — IIT Bombay. 
• Completed Wipro Talent Next certification in Java Full Stack Development (May – September) with 90%+ across all four milestones. 
• Awarded second runner - up position at the Code Beta competition held at LNCTE. 
• Awarded the A - Certificate by the 2 MP Air Squadron in Bhopal, reflecting a high level of achievement and commitment to air squadron training and duties.
